text: The country legend talks penning not one but six songs for the Netflix comedy, reveals plans for her upcoming anthology series for the streamer and dishes on the status of the'9 to 5'sequel. It's downright odd that it took until 2018 for someone to make a rom - com revolving around Dolly Parton's unmatched catalog of empowerment bops, but here we are and here Dumplin'is. Based on the 2015 YA novel by Texas - based author Julie Murphy, Dumplin ', which bowed on Netflix on Dec. 7, tells the story of Willowdean Dickson, the overweight daughter of a former pageant winner slash current pageant host, who signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Blue Bonnet pageant as a tribute to her late Aunt Lucy, whose intense
